global_attrs.NCO: netCDF Operators version 4.7.8 (Homepage = http://nco.sf.net, Code = http://github.com/nco/nco)
global_attrs.experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past
global_attrs.grid: native gx1v7 displaced pole grid (384x320 latxlon)
global_attrs.history: Wed Jun 17 09:28:09 2020: ncks -d ni,,,100 -d nj,,,100 --variable siconc /badc/cmip6/data/CMIP6/CMIP/NCAR/CESM2/historical/r1i1p1f1/SImon/siconc/gn/latest/siconc_SImon_CESM2_historical_r1i1p1f1_gn_185001-201412.nc test_data/badc/cmip6/data/CMIP6/CMIP/NCAR/CESM2/historical/r1i1p1f1/SImon/siconc/gn/latest/siconc_SImon_CESM2_historical_r1i1p1f1_gn_185001-201412.nc

global_attrs.source: CESM2 (2017): atmosphere: CAM6 (0.9x1.25 finite volume grid; 288 x 192 longitude/latitude; 32 levels; top level 2.25 mb); ocean: POP2 (320x384 longitude/latitude; 60 levels; top grid cell 0-10 m); sea_ice: CICE5.1 (same grid as ocean); land: CLM5 0.9x1.25 finite volume grid; 288 x 192 longitude/latitude; 32 levels; top level 2.25 mb); aerosol: MAM4 (0.9x1.25 finite volume grid; 288 x 192 longitude/latitude; 32 levels; top level 2.25 mb); atmoschem: MAM4 (0.9x1.25 finite volume grid; 288 x 192 longitude/latitude; 32 levels; top level 2.25 mb); landIce: CISM2.1; ocnBgchem: MARBL (320x384 longitude/latitude; 60 levels; top grid cell 0-10 m)
global_attrs.variant_info: CMIP6 20th century experiments (1850-2014) with CAM6, interactive land (CLM5), coupled ocean (POP2) with biogeochemistry (MARBL), interactive sea ice (CICE5.1), and non-evolving land ice (CISM2.1)

variable.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
variable.comment: Area fraction of grid cell covered by sea ice
variable.description: Area fraction of grid cell covered by sea ice
variable.title: Sea-ice Area Percentage (Ocean Grid)
